title: olore.config.json
description: Configuration for packaging local documentation with olore-docs-packager

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE validation

name.description: Package name (will be prefixed with 'olore-' when installed)

description.description: One-line description for skill discovery. Will appear in Claude Code's skill list.
examples: API documentation for the payment service

contentPath.description: Path to documentation files, relative to this config file

outputPath.description: Output directory for the built package, relative to this config file

extensions.description: File extensions to include in the package

exclude.description: Glob patterns for files/directories to exclude
